website_summaries.verdict: It may be no-frills, but Hannspree's SD7021 7-inch digital photo frame is a bit better than its budget price would indicate.
cons: Limited memory card and file format support

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality
customer_reviews.text: Great gift for my mom. She loved it. She has trouble with loading new pictures on it. No fault of the product but user error mostly. The outside edge of the frame is a little cheap looking. But good for what it is.
customer_reviews.author: Matt Giannoni

customer_reviews.title: Digital Picture Frames
customer_reviews.text: Picture frame shows good photos, but the instructions are not very clear and doesn't have a detailed list of how to make the product work. Frame is good quality.
customer_reviews.author: MHarris

customer_reviews.title: A birthday gift from my son
customer_reviews.text: I was pleasantly surprised when my twelve-year-old son got me this for my birthday. I knew he could not have spent very much, though, so I was concerned about the quality. I needn't have worried as this little frame is great! It is not top-of-the-line, but anybody looking at it would not even realize. An excellent value for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: How do you get to the internal memory??
customer_reviews.text: Not only is there no section in the "directions" about how to access the internal memory , but I had ordered a flash memory card with it but they were out of stock. Now I want to try this with just it's small internal memory before I spend more money after bad. After what I'm sure will be a very interesting tech support call, I think I'll be returning this item. Bye the way, ANTOnline.com has terrific prices on their own site, but exhorbitant shipping rates to make up for that.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Guitelle

customer_reviews.title: ok product
customer_reviews.text: Ok product. grainy pictures. I guess thats what one would get for that price. another [...] would give a nice digital frame.
customer_reviews.author: Vatsa

customer_reviews.title: Check the weight!!
customer_reviews.text: I made the mistake not checked the weight and oh surprise it weighted 7 pounds which is extremely heavy for a digital frame....
customer_reviews.author: Vero Martin

customer_reviews.title: Hannspree SD7021 7-inch Digital Photo Frame (Black)
customer_reviews.text: Overall, the Hannspree SD7021 7-inch is a good product, but a bit too pricy for it's functionality and versatility.
customer_reviews.author: Juan C. Acosta

customer_reviews.title: Guess you get what you paid for...
customer_reviews.text: Unbeatable price, just received it. The only thing that is nice is the package. The image quality is terrible, buttons are not well designed, the menu lacks clarity and sometime the images will freeze during the loop. I also own a Pandigital and it is so much better in all aspects. Stay away from this one! I am returning it.
customer_reviews.author: Marc

customer_reviews.title: Where is the "8mb internal memory"?!
customer_reviews.text: I assumed based on the description "8mb internal memory" that I would be able to copy photos to an internal drive. Not so... and the product packaging and instructions do not reference any sort of internal memory. A memory card or USB flash drive is required to display photos. Still, not a bad price for the product - but it would have been nice to know I would have to purchase a separate memory card (this is a gift) for the product to work BEFORE I ordered it.
customer_reviews.author: T. Langford

customer_reviews.title: Don't hesitate!
customer_reviews.text: This frame is great. It doesn't have all the elegance of some of the frames as it does have a simple look with the black frame. But, the picture is great and compares as well if not better than the 7" Coby and 7" Westinghouse frames I've bought before! And for the price, DON'T HESITATE!!!!!!! I had this frame loaded with pictures in a matter of minutes without evening getting out the instructions, long story short, user friendly!
customer_reviews.author: Derek Moeller

product_meta.title: Hannspree SD7021 7-Inch Digital Photo Frame (Black)
product_meta.description: Size:7-InchHannspree's 7-inch Digital Photo Frame Widescreen LCD delivers stunning picture quality, displays JPEG photos, 3-in-1 memory card reader, landscape or portrait mode, create slideshows with transition effects, adjustable stand, pivot, 8MB internal memory, alarm clock, perpetual calendar aspect ratio 16:9, resolution 480x234 brightness 200cd.m contrast ratio 500:1 viewing angle 160/160 black
feature_bullets: Minimalist style with mirror surface finish
The low profile back casing makes the digital photo frame seem thinner and lighter
Can be placed in landscape or portrait mode

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.4 out of 5 stars13 ratings3.4 out of 5 stars
